official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the steps which the United States must take to ensure that all Americans have decent and affordable housing.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the steps which the United States must take to ensure that all Americans have decent and affordable housing, including housing rehabilitation, strengthened loan insurance and secondary mortgage institutions, and home ownership programs.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the steps which the United States must take to ensure that all Americans have decent and affordable housing.
